messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Yes, it's an emergency.
Okay, what's going on?
My husband has been shot. Can you call an ambulance? It's been half an hour.
Where is he? Where did this happen?
They're at the mall.
Help is on the way, ma'am. Can you speak with the officers when they arrive?
Yes, the police are here. Shots fired on Green Four at the Macy's.
All units in the area, shots fired, Green Four at the mall. We need an ambulance. Someone's been shot in the head.
Yes, one of my units is out with them right now.
Do you still hear shots? How long ago did you hear them?
It was just like a minute ago.
Do you have any witnesses or any additional information?
I'm not sure, there's a lot of yelling.
I understand. Try to get me some more information if you can.
Okay, I will.
Is it confirmed that someone was shot in the head?
Yes, I was told it was one to the head. It's severe head trauma.
Alright, stay on the line if you can. Help is on the way.
A vehicle has been stolen. EMS and police are here. I'll call you back if needed.
